item.title: 9 injured after car drives into outdoor seating at DC restaurant...
item.description:
wjla.com
DC Fire & EMS is on the scene after a car drove into an outdoor seating area outside the Parthenon Restaurant& Chevy Chase Lounge in Washington D. C. Friday afternoon. According to officials, they are triaging at least 9 patients at the Greek restaurant in the 5500 block of Connecticut Avenue NW and are calling it a "mass casualty" incident. Officials say there was no structural damage to the restaurant.

item.title: Middle East volunteers deployed...
item.description:
nz.news.yahoo.com
Russian President Vladimir Putin has given the green light for up to 16,000 volunteers from the Middle East to be deployed alongside Russian-backed rebels to fight in Ukraine, doubling down an invasion that the West says has been losing momentum.The move, just over two weeks since Putin ordered the invasion, allows Russia to deploy battle-hardened mercenaries from conflicts such as Syria without risking additional Russian military casualties.

item.description:
news.yahoo.com
HBO MaxMinx is epitomized by the closing shot of its fourth episode, in which a hunky male model struts in slow motion, brimming with empowered confidence thanks to his recent feminist awakening, his giant dick swinging in the air. There’s plenty more where that came from in Ellen Rapoport’s HBO Max comedy (March 17), which takes an amusingly breezy look at the creation of a groundbreaking (fictional) 1970s erotic magazine for women. item.title: Two grueling years later, world takes cautious steps forward...
item.description:

The fully vaccinated and boosted restaurant server planned to keep her mask on, but as the reggaeton star Bad Bunny took the stage and the energy in the crowd soared, she ripped it off.
